name: Alert
description: Alert 用于承载显示用户需要关注的关键信息

props.name: icon
props.description: 为 true 时，根据 type 属性显示状态图标。如果需要显示自定义图标，传入 ReactElement

props.name: closable
props.description: 是否可以关闭Alert，当设置为only的时候，点击按钮不会自动隐藏Alert

props.name: children
props.description: 内容，文字或 react 组件

examples.title: Basic
examples.description: The basic usage of Alert, used to display important prompt information in the page

examples.title: Type
examples.description: Set the `type` property to switch between different types of alert boxes. Support 4 different types: `success`, `info`, `warning`, `danger`

examples.title: Basic
examples.description: The basic usage of Alert, used to display important prompt information in the page

examples.title: Title
examples.description: Set the `title` property to display the title mode alert box

examples.title: No border
examples.description: Set the `bordered` property to false to hide the border of the alert box
